name: Spellspawn
description:
Evil takes new form... use your vocab skills to vanquish these Creatures of the Night!! After being sucked into Dracula's Demonic Dictionary, you must fight your way out the only way you know how. Spellspawn is a small action-word-game in which you need to spell words under pressure to stay alive.

The game was originally made for the Click-or-Treat Halloween Bundle, featuring 8 other Halloween-adjacent games by indie developers.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys, Left & Right Mouse Buttons
M to Mute all sounds

By Corey Hardt and MBeefy
October 2022
